definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: So if you need help, you probably will get a significant amount of help.
sentences.chinese: 所以如果你需要幫助，你就會得到很多有用的幫助。

sentences.english: The results are appliable for design of nonel circuit.
sentences.chinese: 這些研究成果對非電爆破網絡設計十分有用。

sentences.english: It aims to improve the useability of sensor uncertain data stream and gain more information from it.
sentences.chinese: 目的在於從不確定傳感器數據流中獲得更多有用信息。

sentences.english: This experience is useful to appreciate the beauty of languages in the world.
sentences.chinese: 這是非常有用的經驗體會到，在世界語言之美。

sentences.english: And again, the half-life is always useful.
Yes, since I had it , the attack was stopped.
sentences.chinese: 有用，自從我吃藥後發作就停止了。

sentences.english: Now, another useful notion is the unit vector to the trajectory.
sentences.chinese: 還有一個有用的概念就是軌道的單位矢量。

sentences.english: Looking back, it was collective code ownership at its finest!
sentences.chinese: 現在回想起來，集體性的代碼所有權非常有用。

sentences.english: What helps me most are deep breathing and drinking water.
sentences.chinese: 而對我最有用的是深呼吸以及喝水了。

sentences.english: If so, was this ability useful?
sentences.chinese: 如果是這樣，那麼這種功能有用嗎？

sentences.english: Remember how excited you were when you built your first useful program?
sentences.chinese: 記得您在構建第一個有用的程序時是多麼興奮嗎？

sentences.english: Helpful in the treatment of diarrhea due to its astringent properties.
sentences.chinese: 有用在腹瀉的治療由於它的收斂性物產。

sentences.english: He has no co ectio or acce to useful information.
sentences.chinese: 他從來不運用或接觸有用的資訊。

sentences.english: What pre-cycle screening tests are required, how much do they cost, and will my insurance provide coverage for these tests?
sentences.chinese: 預備週期要做哪些篩選實驗，費用多少，保險有用嗎？

sentences.english: Also it is very helpful for lady's facial and spa treatment.
sentences.chinese: 同時它是非常有用的治療夫人的面部和溫泉浴場。

sentences.english: Nagaina was one of the few who were also useful to him.
sentences.chinese: 納甘娜是其中少數幾個對他有用者之一。
